Uses of Class
engine.space.AABB

  • Packages that use AABB 
    Package Description
    engine.components
    Provides various components that are useful in virtually any application.
    engine.core.entity
    Classes for defining the objects in the game and their functionality.
    engine.rendering
    Classes for rendering graphics.
    engine.space
    Classes for representing and manipulating multidimensional space.

      Gets the AABB representing the collision range.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ColliderComponent.fitAABB(AABB other)
      Ensures the bounds of the collider are at least big enough to contain other.

      Creates an AABB equivalent to this, but in a new position.
      AABB AABB.scale(double scaleX, double scaleY, double scaleZ)
      Creates a new AABB equivalent to this, but scaled away from the origin by a certain amount.

      Creates a new AABB equivalent to this, but stretched by a certain amount.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AABB AABB.combine(AABB other)
      Creates an AABB that bounds both this AABB and another AABB.

      Tests whether another AABB is completely contained by this one.

      Tests whether another AABB is intersecting this one.

      Returns a set of all objects in a specific range of the spatial structure

      double AABB.resolveCollisionX(AABB other, double moveAmtX)
      Adjusts a movement amount on X so that after the move is performed, this AABB will not intersect other.
      double AABB.resolveCollisionY(AABB other, double moveAmtY)
      Adjusts a movement amount on Y so that after the move is performed, this AABB will not intersect other.
